nodes.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
nodes.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness
nodes.author: Gustaf Alströmer

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感

nodes.excerpt: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
nodes.title: GitWrapped - View/Share how you contributed to Github over the years
nodes.author: DanCodes

localize.description: GitWrased允许你查看这些年来你的Github个人资料的统计数据，你写了多少行，你完成了多少拉请求等等！与您的朋友比较统计数据并在社交媒体上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享这些年来您是如何为Github做出贡献的

localize.description: GitWrased允許你查看這些年來你的Github個人資料的統計數據，你寫了多少行，你完成了多少拉請求等等！與您的朋友比較統計數據並在社交媒體上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享這些年來您是如何爲Github做出貢獻的

nodes.excerpt: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
nodes.title: Icon Mason - Open, edit, & create IconJars directly in Adobe Illustrator
nodes.author: Scott Lewis

localize.description: 从现有的IconJars中打开、浏览和拖放图标。添加、删除或替换现有IconJars中的图标。或者，直接在Illustrator中将画板导出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安装IconJar(但我们建议您这样做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打开、编辑和创建IconJars

localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打開、編輯和創建IconJars

nodes.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
nodes.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click

localize.description: 只需点击一下，就可以计划一整周的用餐时间。只要告诉我们你喜欢哪些食物，以及你想吃多少卡路里、蛋白质、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。换一顿饭，换一天，或者换一周！我们可以安排您的款待，甚至还可以给您一张购物清单！
localize.tagline: 只需单击一次即可生成自定义餐饮计划

localize.description: 只需點擊一下，就可以計劃一整週的用餐時間。只要告訴我們你喜歡哪些食物，以及你想喫多少卡路里、蛋白質、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。換一頓飯，換一天，或者換一週！我們可以安排您的款待，甚至還可以給您一張購物清單！
localize.tagline: 只需單擊一次即可生成自定義餐飲計劃

nodes.excerpt: The best way to find out if your apartment is quiet before signing a lease is to hear from the people who lived there before you. Our site allows users to find apartments and read rating based solely on noise.

localize.description: 在签订租约之前，要想知道你的公寓是否安静，最好的办法就是听听你之前住在那里的人的意见。我们的网站允许用户仅根据噪音来查找公寓和阅读评级。
localize.tagline: 找个安静的地方住

localize.description: 在簽訂租約之前，要想知道你的公寓是否安靜，最好的辦法就是聽聽你之前住在那裏的人的意見。我們的網站允許用戶僅根據噪音來查找公寓和閱讀評級。
localize.tagline: 找個安靜的地方住

nodes.excerpt: Get smarter in just a few minutes every week. Read the key insights from your favourite books in minutes with our in-short summaries packed with actionable tips. P.s It's free to sign up!

nodes.excerpt: Hypnos is a digital sleep journal that helps you discover how your habits impact your sleep. It does this by taking in your mood, daily activities and pairing it with data from your sleep tracker. Delivering insights on how to improve your sleep and habits.
nodes.title: Hypnos - A sleep journal that helps you get better sleep.
nodes.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Hypnos是一本数字睡眠日志，可以帮助你发现你的习惯是如何影响你的睡眠的。它通过记录你的情绪、日常活动，并将其与你的睡眠跟踪器中的数据配对来做到这一点。提供关于如何改善睡眠和习惯的见解。
localize.tagline: 一本帮助你获得更好睡眠的睡眠日记。

localize.description: Hypnos是一本數字睡眠日誌，可以幫助你發現你的習慣是如何影響你的睡眠的。它通過記錄你的情緒、日常活動，並將其與你的睡眠跟蹤器中的數據配對來做到這一點。提供關於如何改善睡眠和習慣的見解。
localize.tagline: 一本幫助你獲得更好睡眠的睡眠日記。

nodes.excerpt: An app to help you plan your real-world and digital social events. By combining event creation, calendars, group chats and information sharing, Herdd puts everything in one place making planning your social events seamless and stress-free.

nodes.excerpt: Following the previously successful model SK61, EPOMAKER has made some improvements based on real customer feedback. Thus we designed this new AK61/AK61S with a custom Mac layout and functions for Mac users.
nodes.title: Epomaker AK61 - A programmable mechanical keyboard with 61 keys

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型号之后，EPOMAKER根据真实的客户反馈进行了一些改进。因此，我们为Mac用户设计了这款带有自定义Mac布局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
